test.name: US-AUTH-002 - Login de Usuário Válido

kw.name: Start Browser Session
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Go To Homepage
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
Navega para a página inicial e espera o carregamento do cabeçalho.
Inicia o navegador e navega para a URL do Front-end.

kw.name: Perform User Login
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Location Is
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL is ``expected``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
Realiza o login de usuário comum (test@example.com / password123).

kw.name: Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: End Browser Session
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Fecha o navegador.

test.doc: Verifica se o usuário pode fazer login com sucesso.

kw.name: Select Available Seat
kw.doc: Clica no primeiro assento disponível (US-RESERVE-001).

kw.name: Proceed To Checkout And Pay
kw.doc: Avança para o checkout, seleciona pagamento e finaliza a compra (US-RESERVE-002).

kw.name: Verify Reservation Success
kw.doc: Verifica se a confirmação final da reserva apareceu.
